input.sentences: the fall was starting off wonderfully .
they were very excited to go to the craft fair .
finally | they looked at the necklaces .
output.sentences: The leaving were beginning to change which meant fall was in full swing.
All of the neighbors started to put pumpkins outside of their homes.
The local craft fair is in fall and I was excited to buy a new pair of earrings.
I looked around at the stalls and looked at some bracelets for sale.
The bracelets were too expensive so I finally decided on buying a necklace.
